Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Had first career hit on 6/2/2017, off Terry Katz (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/2017, off Demetrio Kabas (HOU)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 8/20/2017...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Brooklyn on 6/22/2020...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2020, hitting .418 with 3 HR, 20 RBI...

1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
